name: Enter the Ultraverse
description: Entering the Ultraverse changes your gaming experience in ways no one thought was possible, up until now. The Ultraverse is a place where you have control over what’s rightfully yours. The Ultraverse is a place where you can do what you like with your digital assets. And most importantly, the Ultraverse is a place of choice, freedom, and opportunities… for all. Upon entering, you realize that the Ultraverse, and Ultra itself, is Life.
